fr.umlv.ig.cheatir.loader
Class DiceClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      java.security.SecureClassLoader
          java.net.URLClassLoader
              fr.umlv.ig.cheatir.loader.DiceClassLoader

public class DiceClassLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader

This is a special implementation of URLClassLoader, in fact this class loader can load only class with some specification. This class should :

  • -implements Dice interface
  • -have only ONE constructor
  • -constructor parameter should be int, float or String and nothing else
  • -the constructor should be annotate with DiceDescription annotation

    • Author:
    Clement Lebreton & Jordane Marcel

    Constructor Detail

    DiceClassLoader

    public DiceClassLoader(java.net.URL[] urls)
    This constructor is same as URLClassLoader(URL[] urls)

    Parameters:
    urls - urls in which this loader try to find requested class
    Method Detail

    isDiceClass

    public static boolean isDiceClass(java.lang.Class<?> diceClass)
    Returns if the given class is available for be load by this classLoader

    Parameters:
    diceClass - the checked class
    Returns:
    true if this class if available, false otherwise. More formally, to be available this class should :
  • -implements fr.umlv.misc.Dice interface
  • -have only ONE constructor
  • -constructor parameter should be int, float or String and nothing else
  • -the constructor should be annotate with fr.umlv.misc.DiceDescription annotation
